extendedInfo.description: The Sugar Skull is one of the main symbols seen during the Day of the Dead (DÃ­a de los Muertos) festivities in Mexico. The reason they are called "sugar skulls" is because the authentic sugar skulls were made out of clay molded sugar. Skulls were part of both Spanish and Aztec beliefs about death and the afterlife. The practice of decorating skulls seems to have come from the Aztec tradition.Flowers symbols are also symbolically important part of day of the dead. In this theme the skull incorporates flowers, and this symbol has a meaning of its own. This mixing of the skull, associated with death with flowers, is a symbol in western culture associated with life and love. The meaning of el Dia de los Muertos is not only to remember the dead, but also to overcome the fear of death and celebrate life!This dark Sugar Skull theme for Active Lockscreen is available for download now! Designed and developed by Active Lockscreen, the Sugar Skull theme will improve your Active Lockscreen byâ¢	Providing a pleasing visual experience while using Active Lockscreenâ¢	Delivering a theme with matching buttons, zippers and graphicsThe Active Lockscreen offers users many features and benefitsâ¢	Fast and easy launch of any application â ideal when you are on the Goâ¢	Display your favorite gallery pictures, Facebook feeds and other apps of your choice while your phone is lockedâ¢	Set up shortcuts to any application you want or just let the appâs smart algorithm set your commonly used shortcuts for you â¢	Easy access with one clickâ¢	Reduce clicks to call a contact, launch an app, play a game, browse the web, play music, get Facebook updates or just unlock your phone â¢	Individual optimization to serve your needs (learns what you need from your previous actions)  â¢	Set up frequent contacts for easy calling even when you are on the goâ¢	Call your recent contacts or open the dialerâ¢	Launch your recently used apps â¢	Send Text messages through your SMS Inbox or any other text app such as WhatsApp, Skype, Viber, Email, Gmail, Twitter or LinkedIn â¢	Launch the camera or any picture and graphics related apps installed on your phone such as Instagram, Mobli, Food, Adobe Photoshop ExpressThe Active Lockscreen is easy to use and is the best app for unlocking your phone.- all you need to do is place your finger on the lockscreen ring and drag it to the relevant action or shortcut. Enjoy our new background themes with matching graphics! Important:This is not a standalone app, you need to download the LATEST version of the Active Lockscreen app in order to apply this theme https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.celltick.lockscreen

reviews.title: Fabulous
reviews.comment: Luvin it!!! Juz wat i need. Awesome lockscreen + cool shortcut.n skull+flowers is super hot.
reviews.author: Aisha Jamal

reviews.title: Great look!
reviews.comment: I love sugar skulls and this is one of the best I have seen in searching Google play. Great art for my background on my HTC EVO. I hope to see more in the future.
reviews.author: Sherri Hill

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Cause it creeps out my wife, and kids. Now they won\'t touch my phone!!!!   Thank you
reviews.author: Derek Kilburn

reviews.title: Tab 2 7 inch
reviews.comment: One of the most sleek, stylish,useful,chaming theme on market! Highly recommend for all user out there..no lag, no problem whatsoever!Thumbs up!Thanks Dev..
reviews.author: Auger Frost

reviews.title: One of the better
reviews.comment: Lockscreen apps that\'s out. More customizable than the rest, but other than the stock clock/date/battery info, there\'s no widgets!? 5 stars if able to add more Lockscreen pages and add custom widgets.
reviews.author: Cody Tilley

reviews.title: Nice... But
reviews.comment: Will not let me change background picture htc one x. Shame,  as other than that unique, with nice straight to features. Pls fix then 5stars
reviews.author: Dee Moore

reviews.title: Stunning.
reviews.comment: Sugar skulls are awesome. Love the detailing. Would love to have a launcher theme to go with it!
reviews.author: Jazmin Laracamberos

reviews.title: Very intuitive
reviews.comment: Easy to use, lag free. No crash with default lockscreen and easy to customize. And, there\'s plenty of good themes. And free! Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Alta Razvyaska

reviews.title: Neat
reviews.comment: Awesome app. Really gives my phone a different feel, rather than the regular default lock screen. Good job, would rate 5 stars but i cant change the background.
reviews.author: Jasmine Robertson

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: It\'s so cool being able to access specific sections of my phone with just moving a ring on my lock screen. It is also very convenient if u need to show someone something quick I definitely reccomend downloading it.
reviews.author: Jason Gadner

reviews.title: Love this!
reviews.comment: Very cute and I love that I can access my camera and messages fron my lock screen now.  It changed the whole look of my phone.  I just got the galaxy s4 and now in loving it even more
reviews.author: Ashley Hay

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: I love it. Its simple and easy and looks good!!!:)
reviews.author: LaReina Rose Martinez

reviews.title: Great locker.
reviews.comment: No glitches, easy to use.  Love it.  I wish the presets weren\'t so close together, would be great if I could set every other one blank to space it out.  No other issues, great app.
reviews.author: Penelope Lester

reviews.title: Nice Screen Lock
reviews.comment: Really like the features. I wish the developera make some live lock  themes.!
reviews.author: adii martiinii

reviews.comment: Adorable. Can you make it in pink and turquoise? I\'ll marry you.
reviews.author: Kristi Roe Owen

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: It really breaks the monotony of the plain old home screen. I love the design, too!
reviews.author: Paige Ehnis

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: Nice app.  I thoroughly enjoy it.  Works well with galaxy s3.
reviews.author: Carmen Hall

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: If you like skull themes this is for you
reviews.author: reginald lytle

reviews.title: Worth Your Time
reviews.comment: Very pleasing to the eyes, and it\'s fun to just look at and play around with. Easy to use. However, it tends to lag whenever I unlock my phone. Either my phone will display the home screen without having gone through the lock screen, or it will display the lock screen I used prior to installing the Sugar Skull Active Lock Screen. Overall, this is a very decent lock screen and I absolutely love it, but there is that one bug that\'s irritating. I\'d still recommend this to most people.
reviews.author: Axelle Maxime

reviews.title: Beautiful and smooth
reviews.comment: Bug free as far as I can tell, really gives my screen some style!
reviews.author: Jonathan Hernandez
